put.description: Pass constants from the client to this function. Will pass in constant path, query, and header parameters.

HeaderRequiredClientConstant.name: header-required-constant
HeaderRequiredClientConstant.description: Constant header property on the client that is a required parameter

QueryRequiredDefaultValueClientParam.name: query-required-default-value-param
QueryRequiredDefaultValueClientParam.description: Query parameter on the client that is required and have default value

QueryRequiredClientParam.name: query-required-client-param
QueryRequiredClientParam.description: Query parameter on the client that is required

QueryRequiredClientConstant.name: query-required-client-constant
QueryRequiredClientConstant.description: Constant query property on the client that is a required parameter

QueryNonRequiredClientConstant.name: query-non-required-client-constant
QueryNonRequiredClientConstant.description: Constant query property on the client that is a non-required parameter

QueryRequiredConstant.name: query-required-constant
QueryRequiredConstant.description: Constant query property that is a required parameter

QueryNonRequiredConstant.name: query-non-required-constant
QueryNonRequiredConstant.description: Constant query property that is a non-required parameter
